mapper.select: select b.boardId, b.boardTitle, b.boardContent, b.boardRegDate, b.boardLike, b.boardViewCnt, b.userId, u.userNm from board b inner join users u on u.userId = b.userId order by b.boardId desc

select b.boardId, b.boardTitle, b.boardContent, b.boardRegDate, b.boardLike, b.boardViewCnt, b.userId, u.userEmail, u.userNm, u.userProfile from board b, users u where b.boardId = #{boardId} and u.userId = b.userId
mapper.insert: insert into board (boardTitle, boardContent, userId) values (#{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{userId})
